name: BBQ Chicken
directions: 1. heat grill; 2. put chicken on grill; 3. brush bbq on chicken; 4. do whatever with the water;

name: Mac-N-Cheese
directions: 1. boil water; 2. cook noodles until tender; 3. add milk and cheese;

name: PB & J
directions: 1. select 2 slices of bread; 2. put pb on one slice; 3. put jelly on the other slice; 4. put slices together;

name: Toast
directions: 1. put bread near heat source; 2. grab bread when it's brown

name: Fast Food
directions: 1. drive car to fast food place; 2. give them money for fast food; 3. say goodbye to your last 10 years of life;

name: Salad
directions: 1. takes some lettuce; 2. throw stuff on it; 3. cover it all in dressing
